title: 1959년 Syracuse Transit Corp. v. Hertz Corp. 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Syracuse Transit Corp. v. Hertz Corp.. 판결일: 1959-12-23. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Syracuse Transit Corporation v. Hertz Corporation
**판결일**: 1959-12-23
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 9 A.D.2d 1014

## 판결문 요약


Judgment affirmed, with costs. All concur. (Appeal from a judgment of Onondaga Trial Term dismissing plaintiff’s complaint on the merits, as to defendant Hertz Corporation on motion made at the close of the evidence.) Present — MeCurn, P. J., Kimball, Bastow, Goldman and Halpern, JJ.
...
